import React from 'react' import { ChevronLeft } from 'react-feather' import { Tooltip } from 'antd' import { constant } from '../Chat' import MessagesBox from './MessagesBox' import Input from './Input' class MessagesSection extends React.PureComponent { switchBack = () => { this.props.switchSection(constant.MESSAGE_LIST) } render() { const { withUser } = this.props return ( <>

{withUser.name}

) } } export default MessagesSection
